question.text: Some people think remote work is better than office work, while others believe working in an office is more beneficial. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

questionType.explanation: You must discuss BOTH perspectives equally (remote work AND office work) and clearly state your own opinion.
requirements: Provide specific examples for each view

keyWords.definition: Working from home or outside a traditional office
keyWords.importance: This is one of the two main topics you must discuss

keyWords.definition: Working in a company's physical workplace
keyWords.importance: This is the second main topic you must discuss
Shows comparison - you must weigh both sides
Signals you MUST discuss both sides equally
You must take a clear position - don't be too neutral

essayStructure.introduction: 2-3 sentences: Paraphrase question + state your opinion
essayStructure.body1: 4-5 sentences: Discuss first view (remote work advantages)
essayStructure.body2: 4-5 sentences: Discuss second view (office work advantages)
essayStructure.conclusion: 2 sentences: Summarize both views + restate opinion

commonMistakes: Only discussing one side in detail
Opinion is unclear or too balanced ('both are good')
Copying words directly from the question

structure.introduction: While some believe [View A], others argue that [View B]. In my opinion, [Your clear position].
structure.body1: On the one hand, [Topic sentence supporting View A]. This is because [Reason/explanation]. For instance, [Specific example]. As a result, [Consequence or benefit].
structure.body2: On the other hand, [Topic sentence supporting View B]. The main reason is [Reason/explanation]. For example, [Specific example]. Therefore, [Conclusion about this view].
structure.conclusion: In conclusion, while [Brief summary of both views], I believe [Restate your position with final thought].

example.introduction: While some believe remote work is superior, others argue that office environments are more beneficial. In my opinion, the ideal arrangement depends on the nature of the job.
example.body1: On the one hand, remote work provides significant advantages. This is because employees enjoy greater flexibility and work-life balance. For instance, workers can adjust schedules around family needs. As a result, job satisfaction typically increases.
example.body2: On the other hand, office settings offer important benefits. The main reason is that face-to-face collaboration enhances productivity. For example, creative teams benefit from spontaneous brainstorming. Therefore, complex projects often progress faster in offices.
example.conclusion: In conclusion, while both arrangements have merits, I believe the best choice depends on whether the role prioritizes independent work or team collaboration.

structure.body1: [Your main view - Topic sentence]. Firstly, [Reason 1]. Secondly, [Reason 2]. For example, [Supporting example].
structure.body2: Nevertheless, [Opposite view - Topic sentence]. [Explanation of why others hold this view]. However, [Counter-argument or limitation].
structure.conclusion: To summarize, despite [opposite view], [restate your position] because [final reason].

structure.introduction: [Restate topic]. This essay will discuss both perspectives and explain why [your position].
structure.body1: Supporters of [View A] point to several benefits. The primary advantage is [Main benefit]. This leads to [Effect/consequence]. Additionally, [Secondary benefit with example].
structure.body2: Conversely, advocates of [View B] emphasize different advantages. Chief among these is [Main benefit]. This results in [Effect/consequence]. Furthermore, [Secondary benefit with example].

steps.title: Build Paragraphs
steps.completionCriteria: Complete all 4 paragraphs (10+ words per blank)

content.instructions: Fill in each blank to build your essay paragraph by paragraph. Aim for 10-15 words per blank. Click 'Show Hint' if you need help.

paragraphs.name: Introduction
paragraphs.template: While some _____ [state the first view about remote work], others _____ [state the opposite view about office work]. In my opinion, _____ [clearly state YOUR position].

blanks.label: First view about remote work
blanks.hint: Start with 'believe that remote work' or 'argue that working from home'
blanks.placeholder: e.g., believe that remote work offers greater flexibility and productivity

blanks.label: Opposite view about office work
blanks.hint: Use 'argue that' or 'contend that' followed by office work benefits
blanks.placeholder: e.g., contend that office environments provide better collaboration and team cohesion

blanks.label: Your position
blanks.hint: Be clear! Don't say 'both are good'. Take a position or say 'it depends on...'
blanks.placeholder: e.g., the ideal choice depends on the nature of the job and individual preferences

paragraphs.name: Body Paragraph 1
paragraphs.template: On the one hand, _____ [topic sentence about remote work advantages]. This is because _____ [explain the reason]. For instance, _____ [give a specific example]. As a result, _____ [state the consequence or benefit].

blanks.label: Topic sentence - remote work advantages
blanks.hint: Main benefit of remote work in one sentence
blanks.placeholder: e.g., remote work provides significant advantages in terms of flexibility and work-life balance

blanks.label: Explain the reason
blanks.hint: WHY does remote work provide this benefit? Explain the mechanism.
blanks.placeholder: e.g., employees can structure their schedules around personal commitments and work during peak productivity hours

blanks.label: Specific example
blanks.hint: Give a concrete example - real situation, study, or personal observation
blanks.placeholder: e.g., parents can attend school events without taking full days off, and night owls can work during evening hours

blanks.label: Consequence/benefit
blanks.hint: What is the final outcome or impact of this benefit?
blanks.placeholder: e.g., this leads to higher job satisfaction and reduced stress levels among remote workers

paragraphs.name: Body Paragraph 2
paragraphs.template: On the other hand, _____ [topic sentence about office work advantages]. The main reason is _____ [explain why]. For example, _____ [specific example]. Therefore, _____ [conclusion about this perspective].

blanks.label: Topic sentence - office work advantages
blanks.hint: Main benefit of office work. Use contrasting language.
blanks.placeholder: e.g., traditional office environments offer crucial advantages for collaborative work and team cohesion

blanks.label: Explain why
blanks.hint: Explain the mechanism or reasoning behind this benefit
blanks.placeholder: e.g., face-to-face interactions enable spontaneous problem-solving discussions and facilitate immediate feedback

blanks.label: Specific example
blanks.hint: Concrete example showing office work benefits
blanks.placeholder: e.g., creative teams can use whiteboards for brainstorming sessions, and colleagues can quickly resolve issues through direct conversation

blanks.label: Conclusion about this view
blanks.hint: Wrap up this perspective with a concluding thought
blanks.placeholder: e.g., these advantages make office settings particularly beneficial for roles requiring frequent coordination and collaboration

paragraphs.name: Conclusion
paragraphs.template: In conclusion, while _____ [briefly summarize both views], I believe _____ [restate your opinion with a final thought or recommendation].

blanks.label: Summarize both views
blanks.hint: One sentence mentioning both remote and office work advantages
blanks.placeholder: e.g., both remote work and office environments offer distinct advantages in terms of flexibility and collaboration respectively

blanks.label: Restate opinion + final thought
blanks.hint: Clearly restate YOUR position and add a final insight or recommendation
blanks.placeholder: e.g., the optimal working arrangement depends on the specific job requirements, with hybrid models potentially offering the best of both worlds

content.instructions: Now combine your paragraphs into a complete essay. You can copy from Step 5 and edit, or write fresh. Aim for 250-280 words total.

body1.purpose: Discuss first view with reasons and examples

body2.purpose: Discuss opposing view with reasons and examples

checklist: Introduction clearly states both views and your opinion
Body paragraph 1 discusses remote work advantages with example
Body paragraph 2 discusses office work advantages with example
Conclusion summarizes both views and restates opinion
Variety of sentence structures (simple, compound, complex)
Linking words used to connect ideas

modelEssay.text:
People have differing views about whether telecommuting or office-based work is more advantageous. While both arrangements have their merits, I believe that the ideal choice depends largely on the specific requirements of the job role.

On the one hand, working remotely offers significant benefits in terms of flexibility and work-life balance. Employees can structure their day according to their personal peak productivity hours rather than adhering to rigid office schedules. For instance, many software developers find they produce their best work during evening hours when interruptions are minimal. Furthermore, eliminating the daily commute can save substantial time and money, which workers can reinvest in personal development or family activities. This autonomy often leads to higher job satisfaction and reduced stress levels.

On the other hand, traditional office environments provide crucial advantages for collaborative work and team cohesion. Face-to-face interactions facilitate spontaneous problem-solving discussions and creative brainstorming sessions that are difficult to replicate virtually. Moreover, physical proximity to colleagues strengthens professional relationships and company culture, which remote settings often lack. For roles requiring frequent coordination, such as project management or client-facing positions, the immediacy of in-person communication can significantly enhance efficiency and team performance.

In conclusion, while remote work excels in providing flexibility and autonomy, office-based arrangements better support collaboration and organizational culture. The optimal working model ultimately depends on whether the position prioritizes independent focus or requires extensive team interaction and coordination.
